full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SBYAR BSTAN GYI RNAM BSHAD THUB BSTAN RIN PO CHE GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES SMRA BA'I KHYU MCHOG CHEN PO SGO MANG ZHAL SNGA NAS BSKAL BZANG DNGOS GRUB LA LHA BTZUN THON DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS BSKUL NAS BRTZOM PA GNANG BA'I 'DUL BA'I SPYIR BSTAN 'DI DNGOS SKABS 'GRO PHAN CHE BAS DANG LDAN SDE BA BSKAL BZANG BSAM GRUB NAS BAR BRKO SKABS SMON TSIG 'DI YANG ^RGYAL TSAB MING 'DZIN RTA CHAG PA YE SHES BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I MGON POS BRIS PA 'GRO PHAN RGYA CHEN PO 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: YE SHES BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I MGON PO,
